label: AB_oC16_63_g_2c-001
title: NaHg Structure
comments:
(Nielsen, 1954) give the coordinates of the (4c) Na atoms as (0 y 3/4), but this gives Na-Hg distances which are too small.  Using (0 y 1/4) with the given values of $y$ gives reasonable distances in agreement with those reported in the reference. 
 The ICSD entry has the correct coordinates.
